translation.en: [girl] Dear Diary...
go fuck yourself.
Just kidding. I don't know what to write in this stupid thing.
translation.it: Scherzo. Non so cosa scrivere in questo stupido quadernetto.

translation.en: Anyway, hi.
My name is Sydney.
I'm a boring 17-year-old white girl.
translation.it: Sono una noiosa ragazza bianca di 17 anni.

translation.en: I'm not special, is what I'm trying to say,
translation.it: Voglio dire che non sono speciale.

translation.en: and I'm okay with that.
-♪ I'm not like everybody else ♪ -We moved to Pennsylvania two years ago.
translation.it: Ci siamo trasferiti in Pennsylvania due anni fa.

translation.en: And not, like, a cute part of Pennsylvania either,
translation.it: E non in una bella zona della Pennsylvania,

translation.en: but corn and cabbage and shit.
translation.it: ma in quella con mais e cavoli.

translation.en: Like, my town's won the grand prize for most polluted air in America
translation.it: La mia città ha vinto il premio per l'aria più inquinata d'America

translation.en: for a bunch of years in a row now, so...
translation.it: per un sacco di anni di fila.

translation.en: -♪ 'Cause I'm not like everybody else ♪ -...yippee.
Ms. Cappriotti made me promise to do this.
translation.it: La sig.ra Cappriotti me l'ha fatto promettere.

translation.en: Promise you'll do this.
She said it might help with my moods.
translation.it: Dice che aiuta a migliorare l'umore.

translation.en: It might help with your moods.
I keep losing my temper.
-♪ Like everybody else ♪ -I don't want to, but it just spills out.
translation.it: Non vorrei, ma capita e basta.

translation.en: It's 'cause my dad sort of died... last spring.
translation.it: Perché mio padre è morto la scorsa primavera.

translation.en: So I'm supposed to write... what, now? I don't get it.
translation.it: Quindi cosa dovrei scrivere? Non capisco.

translation.en: Anything. Everything.
Whatever comes to mind.
translation.it: Ciò che ti viene in mente.

translation.en: And now no one knows what to say to me.
Think of it like you're just talking to yourself
translation.it: È un po' come parlare con te stessa

translation.en: and no one will ever read it but you.
translation.it: e nessuno lo leggerà, tranne te.

translation.en: [Sydney] Not even the guidance counselor.
Can I just...
use my phone?
Hmm... Your phone'll be distracting. Don't you think?
translation.it: Il cellulare ti distrae, non credi?

translation.en: I'd like you to have something a little more...
translation.it: Vorrei che usassi qualcosa di più...

translation.en: therapeutic.
These things are never easy, but I do want you to at least attempt
translation.it: Queste cose non sono mai facili, ma vorrei che almeno provassi

translation.en: to have a normal high school experience.
translation.it: ad avere una normale vita da liceale.

translation.en: I mean, she's pretty all right, I guess.
translation.it: Cioè, lei è a posto, credo.

translation.en: Even if she does smell like an old hippie.
translation.it: Anche se puzza come una vecchia hippy.

translation.en: Anyway, here's to a normal high school experience,
translation.it: Comunque, eccomi ad avere una normale vita da liceale...

translation.en: whatever the fuck that means.
And yes, during arousal, there is an increase in all sorts of things,
translation.it: Durante l'eccitazione, c'è un aumento di parecchie cose,

translation.en: including adrenaline and, of course, blood flow,
translation.it: compresa l'adrenalina e, ovviamente, il flusso sanguigno.

translation.en: and the blood flow continues down
translation.it: Il flusso sanguigno va verso il basso

translation.en: and then gets trapped within the corpora cavernosa.
translation.it: e resta intrappolato all'interno dei corpi cavernosi.

translation.en: The penis expands, and this is how the Homo sapien male
translation.it: Il pene si ingrossa ed è così che l'Homo sapiens maschio

translation.en: is able to hold an erection.
Yes.
From my experience, Mr. File,
the holding of an erection is far more successful in the hands of a Homo sapien female.
translation.it: è più facile mantenere un'erezione nella mani di un Homo Sapiens femmina.

translation.en: Very funny, Mr. Lewis.
Just talkin' science.
Moving on.
When a female gets sexually excited,
there is also increased blood flow
translation.it: aumenta l'afflusso di sangue ai genitali...

translation.en: -to the genitals... -Ah. Oh, come on, fire crotch.
translation.it: aumenta l'afflusso di sangue ai genitali... E dai, cespuglietto rosso, ridi. È divertente.

translation.en: -Laugh. That was funny. -[Mr. File] ...proceeds to swell.
translation.it: E dai, cespuglietto rosso, ridi. È divertente.

translation.en: Why is all this happening?
-[laughs] -Your scrotum looks different than others.
translation.it: Lo scroto è diverso dagli altri.

translation.en: That's an asymmetrical scrotum.
translation.it: Si tratta di uno scroto asimmetrico.

translation.en: -[Sydney] My best friend is Dina. -Having one is not at all unusual.
translation.it: La mia migliore amica è Dina.

translation.en: [Sydney] She's such a badass.
Normally, I don't think she'd choose me as a friend,
translation.it: Non credo che mi avrebbe scelta come amica,

translation.en: but we both moved here around the same time.
Both the new kids in town, you know, so, guess I kinda lucked out.
translation.it: Eravamo entrambe le nuove arrivate. Che colpo di fortuna!

translation.en: Before Dina, I mostly just kept to myself.
translation.it: Prima di Dina, stavo per conto mio.

translation.en: I'm not the kind of person that likes attention, really,
translation.it: Non mi piace essere al centro dell'attenzione,

translation.en: but she has this way about her that...
translation.it: ma lei ha questo modo di fare che...

translation.en: she just makes me feel different.
She was with me when I found out about my dad.
translation.it: Era con me quando ho saputo di mio padre.

translation.en: Okay. You ready?
-She held my hand. -One, two...
We cried.
And now, since then, she keeps me laughing
translation.it: E poi, da allora, mi fa ridere,

translation.en: when all I wanna do is melt into the floor.
Which sort of made me realize I've never had a best friend before.
translation.it: Mi ha fatto capire che non ho mai avuto una migliore amica.

translation.en: -♪ And then I ♪ -♪ And I want it ♪ -♪ Yes, I do ♪ -♪ Yes, I do ♪
So, I'm standing there, trying to get by, and he's all like,
translation.it: Sono lì che cerco di passare inosservata e lui mi dice:

translation.en: "Oh, who's the new girl in town?" And I'm like, "Shut up. It's me, Dina."
translation.it: "Chi è la ragazza nuova?" E io: "Ma smettila. Sono io, Dina".

translation.en: Wait, this is Brad... Lewis?
Yeah.
He's sort of sweet, you know?
And then he asked me to homecoming.
translation.it: E poi mi ha chiesto di andare al ballo con lui.

translation.en: Wait, and... and you accepted?
No. I told him to take his washboard abs and chiseled jawline and get out of my face.
translation.it: Gli ho detto di portare i suoi addominali e la mascella scolpita lontano da me.

translation.en: [laughs] Yeah, of course I said yes.
translation.it: Gli ho detto di sì, ovvio!

translation.en: Uh-- Oh, my God. You had sex with him, didn't you?
translation.it: Oddio, ci hai fatto sesso, vero?

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Holy shit.
No way! Holy shit!
You gave Bradley Lewis your V-card?
translation.it: Hai concesso la tua prima volta a Bradley Lewis?

translation.en: -Tell me he used a condom, because-- -Yes, of course.
translation.it: - Dimmi che ha usato il preservativo. - Ovvio.

translation.en: I know.
Dina just got her braces off, and her boobs suddenly arrived.
translation.it: A Dina sono cresciute le tette all'improvviso.

translation.en: So, of course, golden boy Bradley Lewis takes notice.
translation.it: E ovviamente Bradley Lewis, il ragazzo d'oro, l'ha notato subito.

translation.en: So, what, are you guys, like,
suddenly girlfriend and boyfriend or something?
I mean, we haven't put a label on it yet, but...
translation.it: Beh, non l'abbiamo ancora deciso, ma...

translation.en: I really like him, okay?
This is the worst.
Yeah. Oh, yeah. No. Sure, I get it.
Just give him a chance.
Oh, come on, there's gotta be someone you sort of like. Just a little.
translation.it: Dai, dev'esserci qualcuno che ti piace almeno po'.

translation.en: I don't know. I just guess I haven't really thought about it.
translation.it: Non lo so. Forse non ci ho mai pensato.

translation.en: Well, think about it.
And then maybe we can all go to homecoming together, like a double date thing.
translation.it: così magari andiamo al ballo insieme, tipo appuntamento a quattro.

translation.en: -Hey, babe. -Hey!
Sorry I'm late.
-All good, babe. -[kissing]
Ugh. They both call each other "babe." Kill me right now.
Hey, Syd.
Do you think your mom could hook us up with some burgers?
translation.it: Dici che tua madre ci porta qualche hamburger?

translation.en: They're just so great here.
Huh. She's not working today.
I was just asking. [laughs]
Okay.
[Dina] Want a burger, Brad? Let's get a burger.
I've got some cash.
-[Brad] Yeah? -Yeah.
-Wanna share one, babe? -Yeah. Oh, ketchup.
translation.it: - Lo dividiamo? - Sì. Oh, il ketchup.

translation.en: Help yourself.
So...
Dina's just great, isn't she?
[chuckling] Jesus, do you ever smile?
Not today.
[Dina] So, what have we decided?
Whatever you want, babe.
-Please. Please stop. -You gotta try one of these fries.
-I wish you would just stop talking. -[rumbling]
translation.it: Vorrei che la smettesse di parlare,

translation.en: Wipe that smug smile off his stupid, stupid face.
translation.it: togliergli quel sorrisetto compiaciuto dalla faccia da stupido.

translation.en: -Oh, shit. -[Dina] Oh, my God.
Oh, fuck.
-[Dina] Are you okay? -Wait. What?
Yeah, fine. Just give me a minute.
-[Dina] Take a tissue. -[Brad] Gimme a minute, all right?
So, here's the deal.
Today, I almost convinced myself that I made Bradley Lewis's nose bleed
translation.it: Oggi mi sono quasi convinta di aver fatto sanguinare il naso a Bradley Lewis

translation.en: with my mind.
Right.
Mostly, I just need to chill out more.
I am not losing my first and only very best friend ever.
translation.it: Non intendo perdere la mia prima e unica migliore amica.

translation.en: I'm happy for Dina,
and if dating Bradley Dickhead Lewis makes her happy,
translation.it: Se uscire con Bradley Coglione Lewis la rende felice,

translation.en: then I guess I'm okay with it.
[boy] Oh, hey, Syd!
Hey.
He lives down the street from me.
Where I feel shitty about basically everything about myself,
translation.it: Mentre io mi sento una merda in tutto e per tutto,

translation.en: Stan is the master of zero fucks.
translation.it: Stan è il maestro dello "zero sbatti".

translation.en: Oh, my leg fell asleep. One sec.
Can I walk with you?
Sure. Why not?
Cool.
Cool.
Stan is kind of... weird.
You okay?
Shoes. Who needs 'em?
Uh... so, Bloodwitch, am I right?
What?
Bloodwitch. You like their music?
translation.it: Bloodwitch. Ti piace la loro musica?

translation.en: That's a... terrible name for a band.
translation.it: È un nome terribile per una band.

translation.en: Nah. Perfect.
Bet they sound like shit.
Well, I mean, I have-- I have 'em on vinyl...
translation.it: Beh, io ho il loro vinile...

translation.en: limited edition, gatefold and stuff,
translation.it: edizione limitata, copertina apribile e tutto. Se vuoi venire da me, possiamo ascoltarli.

translation.en: if you wanna... come over, and we can listen sometime.
translation.it: copertina apribile e tutto. Se vuoi venire da me, possiamo ascoltarli.

translation.en: We can get high.
I have never been high before.
Yeah, maybe.
I mean, you don't have to.
I was-- I was just, you know...
We-- You know, we live so close, and we've never really hung out before.
translation.it: viviamo molto vicini e non ci siamo mai frequentati.

translation.en: Uh, no, I guess we haven't.
But, yeah. Uh, maybe we should.
Yeah.
Cool. Uh...
Let me know.
What a world we live in, Sydney.
translation.it: In che razza di mondo viviamo, eh?

translation.en: I live with my mom and little brother.
translation.it: Vivo con mia madre e mio fratello.

translation.en: [woman] Sydney! Is that you?
Mom and I haven't been getting along lately.
translation.it: Io e mia madre non andiamo d'accordo.

translation.en: Nope. It's an axe murderer. Good thing you asked.
translation.it: No, un ex assassino. Hai fatto bene a chiedere.

translation.en: Ha-ha! Very funny.
Hey. So apparently, Karen's dog ran through a screen door or something,
translation.it: Ehi. Il cane di Karen si è ferito con la zanzariera,

translation.en: so she had to go to an emergency vet.
translation.it: quindi è dovuta andare dal veterinario.

translation.en: -Okay. -So I'm gonna pick up her shift tonight,
translation.it: - Va bene. - Stasera faccio il suo turno.

translation.en: which is fine 'cause I owe her two shifts from the time Liam ate all that cheese.
translation.it: Gliene devo due per quella volta che Liam si è ingozzato di formaggio.

translation.en: Well, thanks for telling me your life story, Mom.
translation.it: Grazie per avermi raccontato la tua storia, mamma.

translation.en: No. Wait, come back here. I'm not done yet. Eyes on me.
translation.it: No, torna qui. Non ho finito. Guardami.

translation.en: Okay. Question. Big question.
Have you seen my stockings?
They were in the bathroom. They were hanging over the shower curtain?
translation.it: Erano in bagno, appesi alla tenda della doccia.

translation.en: Oh, sorry. I thought they were dirty.
-No, they were drying. -Well, I found them in the bathtub.
translation.it: - Si stavano asciugando. - Erano nella vasca.

translation.en: D-- Well, where are they? They're my last pair.
I sort of...
washed 'em.
Wait. In the washer?
Yeah, and I guess they sort of ended up in the dryer, so...
translation.it: Sì, e credo che siano finiti nell'asciugatrice, quindi...

translation.en: Oh, great.
Now I get to feel like sausage while I'm serving it.
translation.it: Mi sentirò come una salsiccia mentre servo ai tavoli.

translation.en: You don't really have to wear 'em, do you? No one wears 'em anymore.
translation.it: Non serve che li indossi, no? Nessuno li porta più.

translation.en: -Like, since the '90s. -[sighs] Can you--
Can you just make sure that Liam does his homework and eats some dinner?
translation.it: Puoi controllare che Liam faccia i compiti e mangi qualcosa?

translation.en: Isn't he old enough to make sure himself?
Sydney, can you just do something for me, anything, just once, without questioning?
translation.it: Sydney, potresti, per una volta, fare qualcosa per me senza discutere?

translation.en: Here I thought I was being so charming. Nope. Not even a little bit.
translation.it: - Pensavo di essere stata incantevole. - No. Neanche un po'.

translation.en: Really doesn't matter what we're talking about.
-[door slams] -Mom and I could sit in silence
translation.it: Io e la mamma potremmo stare sedute in silenzio

translation.en: for the rest of our lives, and she'd still annoy the crap out of me.
translation.it: Io e la mamma potremmo stare sedute in silenzio  e lei mi darebbe comunque fastidio.

translation.en: Hey, Goob. Done your homework yet?
translation.it: Ehi, pivello. - Hai finito i compiti? - Ore fa.

translation.en: Hours ago.
translation.it: - Hai finito i compiti? - Ore fa.

translation.en: Soon as I got home. What about you?
translation.it: Appena tornato a casa. E tu?

translation.en: Uh... I'll get to it.
Come on, Syd. Mom says you have to work hard if you're gonna succeed.
translation.it: E dai, Syd. Mamma dice che devi lavorare sodo per avere successo.

translation.en: Yeah, well, the plan's always been for me to sit back and watch you succeed, Goob.
translation.it: Beh, ho sempre pensato di starmene seduta a guardarti avere successo, pivello.

translation.en: Oh, hey, who knows?
Maybe one day, if you really work hard enough,
translation.it: Forse un giorno, se lavorerai davvero sodo,

translation.en: you get to be the one to pay for my funeral.
translation.it: sarai tu a pagare il mio funerale.

translation.en: -How was school today? -Well, um...
Richard Rynard punched Toby Gardner in the face,
translation.it: Richard Rynard ha dato un pugno a Toby Gardner

translation.en: and he got sent to Mr. Coffee's office.
translation.it: ed è stato mandato dal sig. Coffee.

translation.en: Oh, yeah?
Yup, and I think I might be next, so... I'm devising a plan. Check it out.
translation.it: Sì. E potrei essere il prossimo, quindi sto escogitando un piano. Guarda.

translation.en: [Sydney] Holy shit, Goob. Is that for you?
translation.it: Porca puttana, pivello. È per te?

translation.en: [Liam] Yup. Designed it myself.
Breastplate, shin guards, spiked gloves...
But I'm not so sure about the helmet situation just yet,
translation.it: Ma ancora non mi convince il casco,

translation.en: 'cause I don't wanna block my peripherals, you know, just in case.
translation.it: perché non voglio bloccare la visione periferica.

translation.en: It's really cool, man. It's some of your best work yet.
translation.it: Troppo forte. Finora è il tuo lavoro migliore.

translation.en: Yeah, it's basically my Mark One, and the first suit's always the hardest to design,
translation.it: Questo è il prototipo e la prima tuta è sempre la più difficile.

translation.en: so it's still a work in progress.
And, sorry, what was the plan again?
Well, I'm gonna build the suit and kick Richard Rynard's ass.
translation.it: Costruirò la tuta e prenderò a calci in culo Richard Rynard.

translation.en: Oh. Vengeance.
Got it.
My family.
I guess we've never had a lot of money.
translation.it: Non abbiamo mai avuto tanti soldi.

translation.en: Like, every place we moved, and we've moved a lot,
translation.it: Ogni posto in cui ci siamo trasferiti, e l'abbiamo fatto spesso,

translation.en: it's always some place like this.
translation.it: è sempre stato simile a questo.

translation.en: It's like a lottery, I guess.
Some kids win big time the moment they're born.
translation.it: Alcuni bambini vincono alla grande quando nascono.

translation.en: The rest of us,
we're all stuck with scratch-offs and bottle caps and shit.
translation.it: rimangono i Gratta e Vinci e i tappi di plastica.

translation.en: -♪ To destroy that feeling ♪ -Liam? Yeah?
If Richard Rynard ever touches you...
translation.it: Se Richard Rynard si azzarda a toccarti

translation.en: before you get your suit built to kick his ass,
translation.it: prima che la tua tuta sia pronta,

translation.en: I'll pull his throat out...
with my bare hands right in front of Mr. Coffee.
translation.it: a mani nude davanti al sig. Coffee.

translation.en: Really?
Yeah. Yeah, like this.
-You are so weird. -[laughing]
Yeah, I know.
Okay, so... confession.
I started getting these zits on my thighs.
translation.it: Mi sono venuti i brufoli sulle cosce.

translation.en: -I am straight up disgusting. -[water dripping]
I've tried zit cream and soap and all sorts of junk.
translation.it: Ho provato creme e saponi per i brufoli e altre schifezze.

translation.en: Nothing helps.
-They're not even that fun to pop. -[rumbling]
[groans] Stop!
It's probably just puberty.
I don't know.
So, Stanley Barber texted me.
translation.it: Beh, Stanley Barber mi ha scritto.

translation.en: -He made me listen to Bloodwitch. -[message alert]
translation.it: Mi ha fatto ascoltare i Bloodwitch.

translation.en: Sometimes at night, I want to touch myself,
translation.it: A volte, la sera, ho voglia di toccarmi,

translation.en: but I don't.
Peanut butter helps.
[man on TV] ...always in a fast-food rut,
Millions have discovered the secret...
[Sydney] The later Mom gets home, the more wine she drinks.
translation.it: La mamma, più tardi torna a casa, più vino beve.

translation.en: What are we watching?
[muffled] Don't know.
[Sydney] We haven't talked about Dad since he killed himself in the basement.
translation.it: Non parliamo di papà da quando si è suicidato nello scantinato.

translation.en: AC's broken.
The unit's probably just... overheated.
translation.it: Forse si è surriscaldato il condizionatore.

translation.en: It's hot as balls in this house.
translation.it: Fa un caldo pazzesco qui dentro.

translation.en: Open a window.
It's that heavy thing we're all too afraid to talk about.
translation.it: È quella cosa difficile di cui abbiamo paura di parlare.

translation.en: I got called in... to the counselor's office.
translation.it: Mi ha convocata la consulente scolastica.

translation.en: -Why? What did-- what did you do? -Nothing.
She just...
She wants me to have, like... an outlet or something.
translation.it: che avrei bisogno di una valvola di sfogo.

translation.en: An outlet for what?
Just, sometimes it feels like...
the people I love don't love me back.
translation.it: le persone a cui voglio bene non ricambino.

translation.en: Well... [sighs]
Maybe you're aiming too high, hon.
translation.it: forse stai puntando troppo in alto, tesoro.

translation.en: She's such a bitch sometimes.
translation.it: A volte è proprio una stronza.

translation.en: Dad would have understood,
but he hung himself,
so I guess I'm on my own.
Sometimes I wonder why he did it,
translation.it: A volte mi chiedo perché l'abbia fatto,

translation.en: and why we never talk about it...
...and what the hell is going on with me.
translation.it: e che cavolo mi sta succedendo.

translation.en: Why sometimes I feel like I'm boiling inside.
translation.it: Perché a volte mi sembra che qualcosa mi bolla dentro.

translation.en: 'Cause maybe...
...I am way more fucked up than I thought.
translation.it: sono molto più incasinata di quanto pensassi.
